message.block.tinymemory.rom: Read Only Memory Module. It accept io signals from Tiny Redstone plates. You can create it in the Memory Assembler
message.block.tinymemory.memory_assemble: Machine that creates an ROM from your Blueprint
message.block.tinymemory.project_table: Machine that can be use to edit an Memory Blueprint
message.item.tinymemory.memory_blueprint: Paper with an memory design. Can be edited in the Project Table
